scripts.compile-all: npm run clean && node-sass --output dist --source-map true --source-map-contents true --output-style expanded src/css
scripts.compile-index: npm run clean && node-sass --output dist --source-map true --source-map-contents true --output-style expanded src/css/index.scss
scripts.compile-dev-all: npm run clean-dev && node-sass --output examples/css/compiled --source-map true --source-map-contents true --output-style expanded src/css
scripts.compile-dev-index: npm run clean-dev && node-sass --output examples/css/compiled --source-map true --source-map-contents true --output-style expanded src/css/index.scss
scripts.compile-sources: npm run clean-sources && node-sass --output src/sources/compiled --output-style expanded src/sources/indexes
scripts.start: npm run clean-dev && npm run compile-dev-all && npm run watch
